attributes.additional_details:
Let those that contribute most financially to the running of the country have a greater say in how it is run.

One person, one vote, plus an additional vote for every £1000 of income tax paid.

The Government should bring forwards proposals to enact this plan.  This can be done in a confidential way such as by means of an adhesive bar code on the poll card indicating how many votes that elector has, but not their name, which they could peel off and stick to the ballot paper.
